thread.title: Washington's best high schools of 2016
thread.title_full: Washington's best high schools of 2016 - seattlepi.com

author: LYNSI BURTON, SEATTLEPI.COM STAFF
title: Washington's best high schools of 2016
text:
Do you live near one of Washington's top public high schools?
If you live in the Seattle or Eastside area, it's quite possible.
School and neighborhood ranking site Niche recently released its ranking of Washington's best high schools of 2016, culling from state and SAT test scores, student and parent surveys and graduation rates, among several other factors.
The greatest weight was given to academics, which makes up half of each school's grade. The academic score given to each school is influenced by statistics and surveys completed by students, alumni and parents.
Scores were also awarded for: health and safety; parent and student surveys; student culture and diversity; teachers; resources and facilities; extracurriculars and activities; resources and facilities; and sports and fitness.
If your local high school didn't make the top 25 as shown in the gallery, see if it makes the top 100.
